documentclass: book

- packages.bib
cover-image: fig/logo_terrahidro.jpg
description: "The TerraHidro Manual is a practical, task-oriented guide to hydrological
  and geomorphometric processing with TerraHidro. It covers setup (Command-Line Interface
  and QGIS plugin), required data formats, and step-by-step workflows to build a hydrologically
  conditioned DEM. Each tool includes concise theory, parameters, command examples,
  and figures, followed by end-to-end examples for flow direction, contributing area,
  drainage/watershed delineation, and export for GIS.\n"
link-citations: true
